title: More efficient shop loading
body: Right now the shop has to load info on champs/skins every time you change tabs. This means that if you click champs it takes a few seconds to load, and then clicking skins it takes a few seconds to load, and then clicking back to champs makes it load again. It should cache some information so you don't have to reload it every time you change tabs.

replies.body: You are absolutely right and we would like to improve that in the future.
